description: a(n) = smallest prime p = prime(k) such that gcd( prime(k+1) - prime(k), prime(k+2) - prime(k+1) ) is a multiple of 2n.
formula: a(n)=Min{x : A057467(x) is a multiple of 2n}
author: _Jeff Burch_, Apr 18 2000
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Nov 09 2000
Corrected and extended by _Ralf Stephan_, Feb 23 2004
